  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(String playerName1, String playerName2, String playerName3, String playerName4, Mode mode, UI gui)
      create the main game with all the player
      Parameters:
      playerName1 - the first player name
      playerName2 - the second player name
      playerName3 - the third player name
      playerName4 - the fourth player name
      gui - true if you want to play with the interface on
      mode - the current mode
